AI Description: libtiff is a library for reading and writing TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) files. It provides support for handling images and documents in various uncompressed and compressed formats.
Core Features: Read & Write Tiff Files, Support For Various Compression Schemes Like Lzw, Zip, Jpeg, Etc., Ability To Handle Different Color Spaces & Depths, Integration With Other Image Processing Libraries, Cross-Platform Compatibility
General Tags: Image Processing, File Format, Library, Tiff, Image Storage
